1:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN bond_type = '-' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(bond_id)
FROM bond;	----- bird -----	toxicology
3:
SELECT
  CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN e.event_name = 'Yearly Kickoff' THEN ex.cost ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / SUM(ex.cost)
FROM event AS e
JOIN budget AS b
  ON e.event_id = b.link_to_event
JOIN expense AS ex
  ON b.budget_id = ex.link_to_budget;	----- bird -----	student_club
4:
SELECT
  T1.event_name,
  T1.event_date
FROM event AS T1
INNER JOIN budget AS T2
  ON T1.event_id = T2.link_to_event
INNER JOIN expense AS T3
  ON T2.budget_id = T3.link_to_budget
WHERE
  T3.expense_description = 'Pizza' AND T3.cost > 50 AND T3.cost < 100;	----- bird -----	student_club
